0.Pros: It was a great first job experience

3.Pros: Flexible hours, friendly co-workers. Raise's every 6 months and a good starting wage.

4.Pros: Fast pace environment, lots of interaction with customers and the organization itself. Opportunity to move positions.
4.Cons: Sometimes long hours, intense, speedy. Sometimes there is a high turnover rate so there are many new people learning positions.

5.Cons: Workers come and go and treated poorly by a lot of customers.

6.Pros: Great Pay! Awesome employment benefits and amazing coworkers !
6.Cons: There are no cons to the job!
